review:
Movie is one time watch. Emraan's acting abilities will hold you to last. Songs are really impressive but overall, I would say, movie is nat that good. I'm still unable to figure out why is investigation officer introduced in the movie as his character plays an incomplete role. Also, why the robber-couple used the same hotel as previous one when they had removed every other clue related to them.
Suspense is there. Movie runs fast in the second half.
Very  nice, one of the old movie witch they've made with perfect  accuracy.  I really liked it very much.  Thanks to Google.

Awesome movie story is also interesting and suspense of the movie is till the end kept you to watch this movie.

Really good movie to watch

Awesome movie Emraan sir you always rocking your movie is awesome your movies song is awesome i like your movies songs
this movie song teri tammana my favourite song
Imran Hasmi acting skills are far good in this movie as compared to his other movies.
Movie which i saw long back,gulabhi ankhein my favourate song
